00131 interface ILocomotion : IUnknown
00132 {
00133     virtual HRESULT _stdcall Link_To_Object(void* pointer) = 0; //Links object to locomotor.
00134         virtual bool _stdcall Is_Moving() = 0;  //Sees if object is moving.
00135     virtual CoordStruct* _stdcall Destination(CoordStruct* pcoord) = 0; //Fetches destination coordinate.
00136     virtual CoordStruct* _stdcall Head_To_Coord(CoordStruct* pcoord) = 0; // Fetches immediate (next cell) destination coordinate.
00137     virtual eMove _stdcall Can_Enter_Cell(CellStruct cell) = 0; //Determine if specific cell can be entered.
00138     virtual bool _stdcall Is_To_Have_Shadow() = 0;      //Should object cast a shadow?
00139     virtual Matrix3DStruct* _stdcall Draw_Matrix(Matrix3DStruct* pMatrix, int* key) = 0; //Fetch voxel draw matrix.
00140     virtual Matrix3DStruct* _stdcall Shadow_Matrix(Matrix3DStruct* pMatrix, int* key) = 0;      //Fetch shadow draw matrix.
00141     virtual Point2D* _stdcall Draw_Point(Point2D* pPoint) = 0;  //Draw point center location.
00142     virtual Point2D* _stdcall Shadow_Point(Point2D* pPoint) = 0;        //Shadow draw point center location.
00143     virtual eVisualType _stdcall Visual_Character(VARIANT_BOOL flag) = 0;       //Visual character for drawing.
00144     virtual int _stdcall Z_Adjust() = 0;        //Z adjust control value.
00145     virtual eZGradient _stdcall Z_Gradient() = 0;       //Z gradient control value.
00146     virtual bool _stdcall Process() = 0;        //Process movement of object.]
00147     virtual void _stdcall Move_To(CoordStruct to) = 0;  //Instruct to move to location specified.
00148     virtual void _stdcall Stop_Moving() = 0;    //Stop moving at first opportunity.
00149     virtual void _stdcall Do_Turn(DirStruct coord) = 0; //Try to face direction specified.
00150     virtual void _stdcall Unlimbo() = 0;        //Object is appearing in the world.
00151     virtual void _stdcall Tilt_Pitch_AI() = 0;  //Special tilting AI function.
00152     virtual bool _stdcall Power_On() = 0;       //Locomotor becomes powered.
00153     virtual bool _stdcall Power_Off() = 0;      //Locomotor loses power.
00154     virtual bool _stdcall Is_Powered() = 0;     //Is locomotor powered?
00155     virtual bool _stdcall Is_Ion_Sensitive() = 0;       //Is locomotor sensitive to ion storms?
00156     virtual bool _stdcall Push(DirStruct dir) = 0;      //Push object in direction specified.
00157     virtual bool _stdcall Shove(DirStruct dir) = 0;     //Shove object (with spin) in direction specified.
00158     virtual void _stdcall Force_Track(int track, CoordStruct coord) = 0;        //Force drive track -- special case only.
00159     virtual eLayer _stdcall In_Which_Layer() = 0;       //What display layer is it located in.
00160     virtual void _stdcall Force_Immediate_Destination(CoordStruct coord) = 0;   //Don't use this function.
00161     virtual void _stdcall Force_New_Slope(int ramp) = 0;        //Force a voxel unit to a given slope. Used in cratering.
00162     virtual bool _stdcall Is_Moving_Now() = 0;  //Is it actually moving across the ground this very second?
00163     virtual int _stdcall Apparent_Speed() = 0;  //Actual current speed of object expressed as leptons per game frame.
00164     virtual int _stdcall Drawing_Code() = 0;    //Special drawing feedback code (locomotor specific meaning)
00165     virtual FireError _stdcall Can_Fire() = 0;  //Queries if any locomotor specific state prevents the object from firing.
00166     virtual int _stdcall Get_Status() = 0;      //Queries the general state of the locomotor.
00167     virtual void _stdcall Acquire_Hunter_Seeker_Target() = 0;   //Forces a hunter seeker droid to find a target.
00168     virtual bool _stdcall Is_Surfacing() = 0;   //Is this object surfacing?
00169     virtual void _stdcall Mark_All_Occupation_Bits(int mark) = 0;       //Lifts all occupation bits associated with the object off the map
00170     virtual bool _stdcall Is_Moving_Here(CoordStruct to) = 0;   //Is this object in the process of moving into this coord.
00171     virtual bool _stdcall Will_Jump_Tracks() = 0;       //Will this object jump tracks?
00172     virtual bool _stdcall Is_Really_Moving_Now() = 0;   //Infantry moving query function
00173     virtual void _stdcall Stop_Movement_Animation() = 0;        //Falsifies the IsReallyMoving flag in WalkLocomotionClass
00174     virtual void _stdcall Lock() = 0;   //Locks the locomotor from being deleted
00175     virtual void _stdcall Unlock() = 0; //Unlocks the locomotor from being deleted

00179     virtual int _stdcall Get_Speed_Accum() = 0; //Queries internal variables

00182 interface IPiggyback : IUnknown //'Piggyback' one locomotor onto another.
00183 {
00184     virtual HRESULT _stdcall Begin_Piggyback(ILocomotion* pointer) = 0; //Piggybacks a locomotor onto this one.
00185     virtual HRESULT _stdcall End_Piggyback(ILocomotion** pointer) = 0;  //End piggyback process and restore locomotor interface pointer.
00186     virtual bool _stdcall Is_Ok_To_End() = 0;   //Is it ok to end the piggyback process?

00188     virtual bool _stdcall Is_Piggybacking() = 0;        //Is it currently piggy backing another locomotor?
00189 };
